snippet.title: Breast Ultrasound
snippet.description: * Breast Ultrasound In addition to determining the nature of a breast abnormality or screening for breast cancer, ultrasounds can also be used to help guide a surgeon while he or she removes a tissue sample from a lump in the breast. This is called an ultrasound-guided core...

snippet.title: Mammography
snippet.description: * Mammography A mammography is a screening tool used to detect and diagnose breast cancer. Together with regular clinical exams and monthly breast self-examination, mammograms are a key element in the early diagnosis of breast cancer. According to the National Cancer...

snippet.title: Lung Cancer
snippet.description: * Lung Cancer Many people are still surprised to learn that lung cancer kills more women than breast cancer. The risks of lung cancer increase dramatically with age and years of tobacco smoking. Men who continue to smoke are over 20 times more likely to die of lung...
